name: Dementia by SUPER Original
description:

PC Build is the official submission.

Putting up webgl for those who can't run on PC (its just missing intro and menu, goes right to the levels).

WebGL: https://nodas9990.itch.io/dementia-by-super-original-webglbuild

Not sure if WebGL is working, itch.io is acting funny.

final submission  was uploaded at 8:53 BST so it passes with extra time.

Controls: 

Only one button - Space bar 

Press for Jump (with wall jumps)

Hold for Left

Find the exit! 

More than one way to beat every level.

Bug - Player color doesn't change in 2nd and 3rd lvl. Dang.
